decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2525-JW-001 Rev P01, 2525-JW-102 Rev P01, 2525-JW-121 Rev P022525-JW-123 Rev P02, 2525-JW-124 Rev P02, 2525-JW-125 Rev P02, UKS9213, UKS9213/install, 4 page lighting information by THORN. Received on 19/03/2015. UKS9213/1/VERTICAL received on 07/05/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The floodlights hereby permitted shall not be illuminated between the hours of 9.00 p.m. and 7.00 a.m, unless otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The use of the rooftop sports pitch shall be restricted to the following times:
7am to 9pm Monday to Friday
9am to 9pm Saturdays, Sundays and Bank Holidays.
unless first agreed in writing otherwise with the Local Planning Authority.
description: Installation of floodlights to existing posts located on the gym roof
